title: power_connection_for_water_transfer_hz_02_to_fz_03_2026_02_01_1338
summary: Connected power supply to initiate water transfer operation for FZ-03.
description: A power connection step was visually recorded at 2026-02-01 13:38 (Asia/Bangkok) for the farm power system supporting water transfer. The capture shows a plug/power connector used to power the pumping operation associated with transferring water from HZ-02 to FZ-03.

event.action: Connected power supply (plug-in) to run the water transfer pump.

reference_context.note: Power system reference: Data Unit 00826. Water transfer path noted: HZ-02 to FZ-03. Intended transfer: WT-F-0001 and WT-F-0002 to WT-M-0002.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
